docs.lead_paragraph: Thanks to Orit Tykocinski, one of the psychologists quoted in my Findings column on tempting fate, I'm starting to understand why American Express is trying to sell me flight insurance by advertising it along with a photograph of an apparently blissful couple on a faraway beach.
docs.abstract: What do blissful scenes on beaches like this have to do with airplane crashes? docs.lead_paragraph: It's the last day of campaigning before the primaries in Indiana and North Carolina, and both Hillary Rodham Clinton and Barack Obama are splitting their days in both states.
